definition.name: AI Assessment Comment Labeler
definition.description: Generate an AI comment based on a prompt file and labels.
definition.author: github

inputs.name: ai_review_label
inputs.description: The label applied to the issue to trigger AI review

inputs.name: issue_number
inputs.description: The issue number to comment on

inputs.name: issue_body
inputs.description: The body of the issue to comment on

inputs.name: prompts_directory
inputs.description: The path to the prompts directory where the .prompt.yml files are located

inputs.name: labels_to_prompts_mapping
inputs.description: A mapping of labels to prompt files, separated by '|'. Format: 'label1,prompt1.prompt.yml|label2,prompt2.prompt.yml'

inputs.name: model
inputs.description: The model to use for AI generation. Will be inferred from the .prompt.yml file if not provided. Action will fail if not found in the file and not provided.

inputs.name: endpoint
inputs.description: The endpoint to use. Defaults to the OpenAI API endpoint "https://models.github.ai/inference"

inputs.name: max_tokens
inputs.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate. Will be inferred from the .prompt.yml file if not provided. Defaults to 200 if not found in the file.

inputs.name: repo_name
inputs.description: The name of the repository. Will be inferred from the GitHub context if not provided.

inputs.name: owner
inputs.description: The owner of the repository. Will be inferred from the GitHub context if not provided.

inputs.name: assessment_regex_pattern
inputs.description: Regex pattern for capturing the assessment line in the AI response used for creating the label to add to the issue. Default: "^###.*[aA]ssessment:\s*(.+)$"

inputs.name: assessment_regex_flags
inputs.description: Regex flags for the assessment regex pattern. e.g.: "i" for case-insensitive matching.

inputs.name: no_comment_regex_pattern
inputs.description: Regex pattern for capturing the no comment directive in the AI response. e.g.: "<!--.*no.*comment.*-->"

inputs.name: no_comment_regex_flags
inputs.description: Regex flags for the no comment regex pattern. e.g.: "i" for case-insensitive matching.

inputs.name: suppress_labels
inputs.description: Do not add any labels to the issue. Useful if you just want to get the AI assessments and labels as outputs.

inputs.name: suppress_comments
inputs.description: Do not add any comments to the issue. Useful if you just want to get the AI assessments and labels as outputs.

outputs.name: ai_assessments
outputs.description: JSON array of objects representing all assessments made by the AI e.g. "[{"prompt": "security.prompt.yml", "assessmentLabel": "ai:security:high risk", "response": "### Assessment: High Risk\nThe code contains..."}]"
